channel.title: News - Polish Military
channel.description: News articles related to Polish Military

item.title: Celebrating Artillery Festival
item.description: Wishes extended to artillerymen and rocketeers on Saint Barbara's Day for precision and success.

item.title: Poland to Integrate Drones into Military
item.description: Poland aims to enhance military capabilities by integrating drones with tanks, helicopters, and rocket launchers for better information exchange.

item.title: Polish Soldiers Join Polonia for Christmas Eve
item.description: PKW EUFOR soldiers celebrated Christmas Eve with the Polish community in Bosnia and Herzegovina.

item.title: European Security Lessons from Ukraine War
item.description: Polish leaders discuss adapting military strategies based on ongoing conflict in Ukraine.
